eventDeatureData.Heading: Learn HLD of Live Streaming Platforms
eventDeatureData.paragraph1: Nothing beats the adrenaline rush of watching an exciting cricket match. All of our differences vanish as we team up for 120 minutes to see who will emerge victorious in this battle of bat and ball and wits!
eventDeatureData.paragraph1_1: Have you ever wondered how streaming platforms reach millions of devices at the same time, uniting us all for a small period while we devote our full attention and allegiance to screens? This year's T20 world cup got us all thinking about how it works!
eventDeatureData.paragraph2_2: who is hosting a FREE Masterclass on
eventDeatureData.paragraph3: Register today to reserve your spot.
eventDeatureData.paragraph24: Understand how to design scalable systems.
eventDeatureData.paragraph5: Insights on data models, and building flows through asynchronous processing.
eventDeatureData.paragraph5_1: Understand use of micro-service architecture, queues, cache, indexes etc with  streaming platforms.
eventDeatureData.para3: What you will gain from this Masterclass
eventDeatureData.paragraph6: Create workflows by utilizing queues, databases, and the role of caching.
eventDeatureData.paragraph7: Learn how large streaming platforms can scale to millions of concurrent users.
eventDeatureData.paragraph8: Know how to handle HLD system design issues in interviews.
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_1: How a video is live streamed in real time.
eventDeatureData.paragraph9_1: Senior Software Engineer from one of the MAANG Companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph7_2: SDEs Wishing to convert to product companies from Service companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_3: SDEs wanting to learn System Design
eventDeatureData.para7: What our Learners have to say
eventDeatureData.paragraph14: Learnbay offers domain specialized courses in fields such as full-stack software development, Data Structure Algorithms and System Design
eventDeatureData.paragraph15: Are you an Engineer who’s not happy with the job and wants to upskill and get into MAANG companies? We are here with the best option, Learnbay’s software development and DSA system design courses are designed for the working professionals who wants to advance their career.
eventDeatureData.paragraph17: A curriculum that has been developed, supervised, and approved by industry experts
eventDeatureData.paragraph18: 1:1 mentorship, guided by top experts in the field
eventDeatureData.paragraph19: Gain technical expertise by working on challenging real- world projects
eventDeatureData.paragraph20: 250 + hiring partners with dedicated placement support and 100% Interview guaranteed
eventDeatureData.paragraph21: NEW! Attend a free Demo Class now and the enroll for the domain you’re looking for.
